page.title: 17MARITIME MUSEUM -IRVINE
page.content: The {Maritime Museum }is a new museum which opened in summer 1985.It is located near the harbour in a triagular shaped building on the site of the old shipyard. It is very popular because it has many exhibits of boats which the public can inspect. The museum owns the former Irvine Harbour Company tug{"GARNOCK"}and the historic coaster{"KYLES"}built in Paisley in 1872. As well as a large collection of shipbuilding and engineering machine tools,a steady stream of items e.g. anchors,work plates,old photographs and documents have been added. At the museum, interested {volunteers are woking on the boats to return them to their former glory.
